view

Class LayerManager

  • java.lang.Object
    • view.LayerManager

  • public class LayerManager
extends java.lang.Object
    A class for handling layers (drawing Components on top of other Components) maintains a LinkedList of Components in order of their layer
    Author:
    Spencer Yoder

      Nested Classes

      A Node in the LinkedList

      The front of the LinkedList of Components
